song_name: Heart Of Glass (Live from the iHeart Festival)
lyrics:
35 contributorsheart of glass live from the iheart festival lyricschorus
once had a love and it was a gas
it soon turned out i had a heart of glass
seemed like the real thing only to find
much o mistrust loves gone behind

it seemed like the real thing but i was so blind
much o mistrust loves gone behind

love is so confusing theres no peace of mind
if i fear im losing you its just no good
you teasing like you do

lost inside adorable illusion and i cannot hide
